an10.102:4.1: “Mendicants, when the seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated they fulfill three knowledges.
an10.102:4.3: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquillity, samādhi, and equanimity.
an10.102:4.4: When these seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated they fulfill three knowledges.
an10.102:4.6: It’s when a mendicant recollects their many kinds of past lives, that is,
an10.102:4.7: one, two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand lives; many eons of the world contracting, many eons of the world evolving, many eons of the world contracting and evolving. …
an10.102:4.8: And so they recollect their many kinds of past lives, with features and details.
an10.102:4.9: With clairvoyance that is purified and surpasses the human, they see …
an10.102:4.10: … how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
an10.102:4.11: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having achieved it with their own insight due to the end of defilements.
an10.102:4.13: When those seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated they fulfill these three knowledges.”
